title.rendered: “IDF’s Successful Night Operation: Six Arrests and Multiple Weapon Seizures Across Judea and Samaria”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF soldiers, Shin Bet and Border Police operated last night in arresting six wanted individuals across Judea and Samaria and confiscating numerous weapons.

In a brigade-wide operation in the village of Jilzun in the Binyamin Brigade, five wanted individuals were arrested and numerous weapons were confiscated. In the Kalandia refugee camp, another wanted person was arrested and weapons were confiscated. In addition, in operations by the forces in the village of Qusra in the Samaria Brigade and the village of Barta’a in the Menashe Brigade, the forces found and confiscated numerous weapons.

The wanted individuals who were arrested and the weapons that were confiscated have been transferred for further processing by security forces. Our forces sustained no injuries.

Since the beginning of the war, approximately 2,550 wanted individuals have been arrested across the Judea and Samaria Division and the Jordan Valley and Valleys Brigade. About 1,300 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terrorist organization.
